title: Facebook spent $20 million last year on Zuckerberg's personal security, up 4 times from 2016
text: As Facebook's scandals have increased so too has the amount of money the company spends to protect CEO Mark Zuckerberg.

title: Facebook changes board
text: CNBC's Seema Mody reports on changes to Facebook's board of directors.

title: Netflix CEO Reed Hastings to depart Facebook board of directors
text: Reed Hastings, who has served on the Facebook board since 2011, will not be nominated for re-election at the company's 2019 annual stockholders meetings, Facebook said on Friday.

title: Tim Draper Meeting With Facebook To Discuss Cryptocurrency Investment
